column1: Petare is a neighborhood in Miranda
column3: and is part of the Metropolitan District of Caracas.  It is located in the Sucre Municipality
column4: one of the five divisions of Caracas.  The city was founded in 1621 under the name of San Jose de Guanarito.  It grew to become a part of the greater Caracas area as the latter expanded in area and population.

column1: The neighborhood is towards the eastern edge of Caracas
column2: but has developed its own commercial core.  Two universities are located in Petare: Universidad Santa Mar√≠a and Universidad Metropolitana.  Poverty remains a major limitation to the city's development.  The population of Petare is 369
column3: 000. It is regarded as one of the largest slums in the world.Petare station of Caracas Metro is located in Petare.
